name: Quote of the Day by QuoteLand
author: Quote Land

sections.description:
This plugin lets you add a Quote of the Day widget to your WordPress page. Famous quotations will automatically appear on your page, every day!

Note: you may only use the WordPress plugin WITHOUT modification. You may not remove the links without our permission.

Features

  • Plugin allows you to place multiple widgets on your page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload dailyquote_widget.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Appearance, Widgets in WordPress.
  4. Drag the Quote of the day Widget to the sidebar, for example the Main Widget Area or the Secondary Widget Area.
sections.faq:
What versions of WordPress does this work with?

We tested with 3.8, but it probably works with other versions (3.x or greater).

Thanks for installing this widget!
sections.changelog:
=1.0.1 * Minor changes to documentation

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
  • This is our first release, so please let us know if you have any trouble!
